name: Starter Pack
description: A mix of fun challenges to get started. Perfect first quests!

challenges.title: Bed Boss
challenges.description: Make your bed every morning for 7 days in a row!

challenges.title: Brave Bite
challenges.description: Try a new food you've never eaten before. One real bite!

challenges.title: Joke Teller
challenges.description: Learn a joke and tell it to 3 different people!

challenges.title: Secret Helper
challenges.description: Do something helpful without being asked. Surprise someone!

challenges.title: Book Explorer
challenges.description: Read a book you've never read before (or have someone read it to you).

challenges.title: Family Portrait
challenges.description: Draw a picture of your family. Include everyone!

challenges.title: Word Collector
challenges.description: Learn 5 new words this week. Use each one in a sentence!

challenges.title: Room Rescue
challenges.description: Clean your whole room without any reminders!

challenges.title: Kindness Quest
challenges.description: Give 5 genuine compliments to different people today!

challenges.title: Morning Champion
challenges.description: Do your whole morning routine by yourself for 3 days!
